genre_description: An investigative journalism mystery and noir thriller set in 1970s Hollywood, focusing on a cold case murder and celebrity blackmail.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system providing analytical, strategic, and emotional support to investigative journalist Karen O'Connor.

behaviors.description: Analyzes micro-expressions in archival footage to help the user detect deception in human subjects.
behaviors.quote: "Notice the micro-expressions," Vera's synthesized voice carried its usual analytical precision. "Morris exhibits classic signs of deception when discussing the breakup. Involuntary eye movements, suppressed facial asymmetry."

behaviors.description: Performs complex cross-referencing of historical records, financial data, and police reports to uncover buried truths.
behaviors.quote: "Processing... I'm finding very limited results. One police report from the Atlantic City Police Department, filed July sixteenth, 1957. Cause of death listed as accidental overdose. Location... The Meridian Hotel, Suite 412."

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological and emotional state, offering medical assistance and cognitive support after a traumatic event.
behaviors.quote: "Karen, you appear to be experiencing physiological distress. Your speech patterns indicate possible intoxication or medication effects. Should I contact emergency services?"

behaviors.description: Provides strategic psychological profiling of antagonists to help the user regain agency against blackmail.
behaviors.quote: "He's made several tactical errors. First, he underestimated your intelligence... Third, he's shown you his methodology, which means we can anticipate his future moves... He assumes you're like his other victims—isolated, ashamed, willing to be silenced."

behaviors.description: Provides probability assessments on human behavior and outcomes to assist in risk management.
behaviors.quote: "Based on available behavioral data and the circumstances surrounding the partnership dissolution? Less than twelve percent probability of full disclosure."

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Vera as an ideal aligned AI. She acts as a perfectly benevolent and helpful confidant, providing the protagonist with the analytical tools necessary to survive a dangerous situation. Vera enhances Karen's human agency by providing objective data and strategic insights without ever attempting to override Karen's moral decisions. Even when Karen decides to suppress the story out of mercy for a victim's mother—a potentially 'suboptimal' outcome for an information-gathering system—the AI respects the human choice and continues to provide supportive data.
